com.billy.android.loading

类 Gloading.Holder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.billy.android.loading.Gloading.Holder
  • 封闭类:
    Gloading

    public static class Gloading.Holder
extends java.lang.Object
    Gloading holder create by Gloading.wrap(Activity) or Gloading.wrap(View) the core API for showing all status view

    • 方法概要

      void showLoadSuccess()
      show UI for status: Gloading.STATUS_LOAD_SUCCESS
      Gloading.Holder withData(java.lang.Object data)
      set extension data. maybe we need this data within Adapter#getView(Holder, View, int)
      Gloading.Holder withRetry(java.lang.Runnable task)
      set retry task when user click the retry button in load failed page
